extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Mechanical Energy in energy and Power Core in Iron Man have the ability to quantify the object's ability to perform work and store energy based on its motion and position within a force field
extended_metaphor.mechanical_energy: Mechanical Energy combines kinetic and potential energy to provide a comprehensive measure of the object's mechanical capabilities.
extended_metaphor.power_core: Similarly, the Power Core in Iron Man serves to combine and harness energy to provide the necessary power for Iron Man's suit to perform various tasks and combat enemies.
